input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Santini Tono Profilo Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Men's Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Men's Snap Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Colore Riga Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Tudor Pro Cycling Team 2025 C2 Evo Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Paws Forma Slim Fit Jersey'
  - Name='RAICHA MAAP-Cycling Jersey Men Cycling Jersey Road Bike Shirt Summer Jersey MTB Maillot'
  - Name='Santini Trek Factory Racing 2025 short sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Santini Enigma x Ironman Triathlon Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Quest Men's Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Trail LS Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Colore Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Luce Unisex Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Redux Istinto Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Redux Istinto Jersey Man'
  - Name='MAAP Aerate Pro Air Jersey 3.0'
  - Name='Jersey Man Santini Eco Sleek Bengal Short Sleeve'
  - Name='men Santini Uci World Champion Belgium 2025 Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='PRO Thermal Jersey'
  - Name='Static Women's Core Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Tono Profilo Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey similar in function and likely in materials and construction, designed for performance and comfort like the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Men's Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cycling jersey likely sharing core features such as lightweight construction and moisture-wicking, but less specific about compression fit or sustainability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Men's Snap Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cycling jersey designed for performance, likely comparable in materials and features focused on comfort and moisture management.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Colore Riga Short Sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve men's cycling jersey with probable similar design goals including comfort and riding practicality.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tudor Pro Cycling Team 2025 C2 Evo Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pro-level cycling jersey from a team collection, likely similar in function though possibly focused more on racing than general comfort and sustainability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Paws Forma Slim Fit Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit short sleeve cycling jersey aligned with the performance and fit features of the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: RAICHA MAAP-Cycling Jersey Men Cycling Jersey Road Bike Shirt Summer Jersey MTB Maillot
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cycling jersey designed for multiple disciplines including road and MTB, similar lightweight and moisture-wicking features, but multipurpose may differ slightly in cut.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Trek Factory Racing 2025 short sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Team race jersey, short sleeve for men, similar sleeve length and intended use, but possibly more race-focused than the versatile core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Enigma x Ironman Triathlon Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Triathlon specific jersey likely shares moisture management but has a distinct fit and design targeting triathletes rather than general cycling.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal jersey targets colder conditions, differing substantially in construction and intended use from the lightweight, summer suitable Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Quest Men's Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve design diverges from short sleeve reference, although still a cycling jersey sharing some functional features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Trail LS Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve trail jersey designed for mountain biking, so differs somewhat in purpose and sleeve length from the reference road cycling short sleeve jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Colore Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a short sleeve cycling jersey designed with similar intent for comfort and performance as the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Luce Unisex Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve and unisex design likely differ in cut and intended riding conditions from the short sleeve tailored Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Redux Istinto Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling jersey aligned with the Core Jersey in function and technology but may have different fabric or fit details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Redux Istinto Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's version of the above, similar relevancy for the same reasons.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Aerate Pro Air Jersey 3.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance short sleeve cycling jersey with advanced fabric and construction, very relevant in features and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Jersey Man Santini Eco Sleek Bengal Short Sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Eco-friendly short sleeve cycling jersey with sustainable elements, closely aligning with the reference product's sustainability and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Santini Uci World Champion Belgium 2025 Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Team race jersey, short sleeve men's cut, very similar although more specialized for competition than general use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: PRO Thermal Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Thermal cycling jersey targeting cold weather conditions, fundamentally different in construction and use from the lightweight Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Static Women's Core Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares name 'Core Jersey' implying similar design intent but is for women and possibly different cut; still relevant but less closely matched than men's short sleeve jerseys.
